title: Urgent help needed
content:
I'm more into academics, don't care about college life, wanna do masters abroad.(all through kcet)

Today gotta decide so please tell in comments also.

[View Poll](https://www.reddit.com/poll/1f7ayj1)

comments.body: If rr is closer to you, I'd pick it. Otherwise take ec cs. Ec cs is slightly better but not by a considerable margin. This is due to them including all core courses in aiml. Still, Core is slightly better
